Pixie Dust.name: Pixie Dust
Pixie Dust.fullText:
Pixie Racial Utility Pixie Dust

You hurl a bright globe of fey magic that grants your friend the ability to soar through the air for a moment.

Encounter
Move Action      Ranged 5

Target: One ally

Effect: The target can fly up to 6 squares as a free action.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 28.
Pixie Dust.flavor: You hurl a bright globe of fey magic that grants your friend the ability to soar through the air for a moment.
keywords:
Ranged 5

Target: One ally

Effect: The target can fly up to 6 squares as a free action.
Pixie Dust.effect: The target can fly up to 6 squares as a free action.

Shrink.name: Shrink
Shrink.fullText:
Pixie Racial Utility Shrink

At your touch, an object shrinks to your wee size or is restored to its original state.

Encounter
Minor Action      Melee 1

Target: One object that is sized for a Medium or Small creature, is not inside a container, does not contain anything, and is not held, worn, or carried by anyone other than you.

Effect: The target shrinks to a size appropriate for a Tiny creature’s use. The new size ends at the end of your next extended rest unless the shrunken target is on your person. The size also ends if you or another pixie uses this power on the shrunken target. While shrunk, the target keeps its game statistics, such as damage dice and weight. A shrunken weapon, however, becomes an improvised one-handed weapon for a non-Tiny creature.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 28.

Ventriloquist Prank.name: Ventriloquist Prank
Ventriloquist Prank.fullText:
Pixie Racial Utility 2Ventriloquist Prank

You gleefully project an alarming noise that distracts and hinders your foe.

Encounter      Illusion
Minor Action      Ranged 5

Target: One creature that isn’t deafened

Effect: Roll a d6 to determine the power’s effect.

  1-3: You slide the target up to 2 squares, but not into hindering terrain.

  4-6: The target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 33.
Ventriloquist Prank.flavor: You gleefully project an alarming noise that distracts and hinders your foe.
Ventriloquist Prank.effect: Roll a d6 to determine the power’s effect.

Pixie Invisibility.name: Pixie Invisibility
Pixie Invisibility.fullText:
Pixie Racial Utility 6Pixie Invisibility

Focusing all your concentration, you vanish from sight.

Encounter      Illusion
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You become invisible until you attack or until the end of your next turn.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 33.
Pixie Invisibility.flavor: Focusing all your concentration, you vanish from sight.
Pixie Invisibility.effect: You become invisible until you attack or until the end of your next turn.

Gift of Flight.name: Gift of Flight
Gift of Flight.fullText:
Pixie Racial Utility 10Gift of Flight

With a sprinkling of pixie dust, your companions take to the air.

Encounter
Minor Action      Close burst 1

Target: Each ally in the burst

Effect: Each target gains a fly speed of 6 until the end of his or her next turn. If the target doesn’t land at the end of this movement, he or she descends to the ground without taking falling damage.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 33.
Gift of Flight.flavor: With a sprinkling of pixie dust, your companions take to the air.

Fairy Dance.name: Fairy Dance
Fairy Dance.fullText:
Pixie Racial Utility 16Fairy Dance

You strike up the enchanted music of the fey, granting your companions grace even as your foes trip and fumble around you.

Daily      Aura, Charm
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You activate an aura 2 that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any ally who starts his or her turn in the aura can shift 1 square during that turn as a free action. Any enemy that starts its turn in the aura is slowed until the start of its next turn.

Sustain Minor: The aura persists until the end of your next turn.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 33.
Fairy Dance.flavor: You strike up the enchanted music of the fey, granting your companions grace even as your foes trip and fumble around you.
Fairy Dance.effect: You activate an aura 2 that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any ally who starts his or her turn in the aura can shift 1 square during that turn as a free action. Any enemy that starts its turn in the aura is slowed until the start of its next turn.
Fairy Dance.sustainMinor: The aura persists until the end of your next turn.

Pixie Teleport Trick.name: Pixie Teleport Trick
Pixie Teleport Trick.fullText:
Pixie Racial Utility 22Pixie Teleport Trick

Even as you reel from a foe’s attack, you vanish in a puff of fragrant smoke and reappear a safe distance away.

Daily      Teleportation
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an enemy attacks you, you can use an immediate reaction to teleport up to 5 squares.


Published in Heroes of the Feywild, page(s) 33.
Pixie Teleport Trick.flavor: Even as you reel from a foe’s attack, you vanish in a puff of fragrant smoke and reappear a safe distance away.
Pixie Teleport Trick.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an enemy attacks you, you can use an immediate reaction to teleport up to 5 squares.
